resources.string: To change notification sounds, two permissions are required. First, please enable Notification Access. You may need to tap the switch again to grant the second permission.
This is the second permission. Please allow Smart Notifier to send notifications. This is necessary to play the custom sound. If the switch turned off, please tap it again.

This app changes the notification sound of the ChatGPT app based on keywords.


1. Grant Permissions
 To use this app, you need to grant two permissions: "Notification Access" and "Notification Permission". Please enable them by tapping the switch on the main screen.


2. Set Up Rules
 Tap the "Settings" button to configure up to 10 rules. For each rule, you can set a "search keyword" and a "custom sound".


3. How It Works
 When a notification from the ChatGPT app arrives, this app will:
 - Check if the notification title or text contains any of your keywords.
 - If a match is found, it will cancel the original notification and immediately post a new one with your specified custom sound.


For more details, please visit our website:
https://example.com/smart-notifier-help
